column1: Smoque BBQ////I love Smoque's BBQ. I seldom eat pork
column4: (which is why I went) holiday days or vacation. I live in the south suburbs of Chicago but will travel for Smoque's
column5: yes it's that good. What's good
column9: oh & the coleslaw. I had the fries once some years ago
column10: but it was a lot so I don't order them. I ordered a whole slab
column11: the other half is in my freezer. I love the cornbread & mac in their own tinfoil container
column12: I also ordered some to take home as well. I went for lunch on a weekday & it was not crowded
column14: so I enjoyed eating inside. Last year I ordered to go because of COVID.
